This is the first official release of UNAB GO!, designed for applicants, students, and teachers of UNAB. 

Current features:
• Firebase Authentication login.
• Navigation across main sections (Home, I Want to Be UNAB, Banu-AI, Profile).
• Interactive Banu-AI section.
• Direct access to academic programs.
• Multilanguage support.
• Credits section.

Upcoming updates:
• Custom notifications.
• Smart AI chat.
• “I’m UNAB” student section.
• Interactive campus map.

UNAB GO! is a nonprofit academic application created for educational purposes and the UNAB community. 

All data handled within the app is academic and not shared with third parties. 

The app aims to provide information, guidance, and tools for applicants, students, and teachers.
